name: Fragments (itch) (Matomatt)
description:
Explore a space ship in panic. Adapt to the situation, solve the problems that appear. Use high-tech tools and interact with your environment. Each of your actions determines the fate of the crew. How far will you go to save your dream?

ZQSD or arrow keys to move. Spacebar to jump. Shift to sprint.

Left click to interact, Right click to use object.

The game is available in english, french, german and spanish !
